# Data manipulation

## Series and vectors

In polars objects, `Series` object are like R `vectors`.

::: {.panel-tabset}
## polars

```{r}
#| label: series-polars
mynumbers <- pl$Series(1:4)
myletters <- pl$Series(c("a","b","c"))
```

## R base

```{r}
#| label: vectors-rbase
mynumbers <- 1:4
myletters <- c("a","b","c"))
```

:::

## DataFrame and data.frame

::: {.panel-tabset}
## polars

```{r}
#| label: dataframe-polars
pl$DataFrame(
  col1 = mynumbers,
  col2 = myletters,
)
```

## R base

```{r}
#| label: dataframe-rbase
data.frame(
  col1 = mynumbers,
  col2 = myletters
)
```

## dplyr

```{r}
#| label: tibble-dplyr
tibble(
  col1 = mynumbers,
  col2 = myletters
)
```

## data.table

```{r}
#| label: tibble-datatable
data.table(
  col1 = mynumbers,
  col2 = myletters
)
```

:::
